channel.title: Need help with private [ 508 pali's base ]
channel.description:
Ok, I didn't find a section for 508s, so don't flame if I am in wrong section.
I am pretty new to coding, doing pretty well on server, but for a month of coding got A LOT OF questions.
1) Need help with removing arrows when ranging. 2) how do I add protect item? ( looking for a way of how to check the price of equipped items and etc) 3) real skulls. Setting up 20 minutes timer for not getting skulled and etc... 4) Adding non-multi for melee, magic and etc. 5) item operate handler ( in inv) 6) magicOnNPC handler 7) looking for effecient way of adding mixing potions ( cba adding in itemOnItem 1 by 1... will need 150 statements to do it this way) 8) requesting mapdata for western areas of wilderness ( badly need it for agility area) 9) need help with npcRequestTo [code]n.requestFaceTo(p.playerId + 32768);[/code] brings me Error: Class72:59 PacketParser:1266 Class14:33 Class90:143 client:784 Applet_Sub 1:485 Applet_Sub1:156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.RuntimeException: gnp1 po s:42 psize:6 | T2 - 222,216,217 - 6,2489,5173 - 11,2,0,16,-128,1,
10) SOLVED
11) going above 99hp makes the hp bar almost fully red, some green.. if go back to below 99 hp bar works fine. Need help with setting hp bar to be full green if going above 99hp.
Thank you for reading.
p.s. leave msn if you're willing to help or just leave the post. :)

item.title: Need help with private [ 508 pali's base ]

ok thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 04:24:44 pm[/size][hr]still looking for help

[quote=“543211, post:3, topic:251037”]ok, does it depend on amount of npcs in certain area or the overall amount of NPCs I’ve spawned?[/quote]Overall npcs spawned in the npcspawn.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with private [ 508 pali's base ]
item.description:
@543211 wrote:

Ok, I didn’t find a section for 508s, so don’t flame if I am in wrong section.

I am pretty new to coding, doing pretty well on server, but for a month of coding got A LOT OF questions.

  1. Need help with removing arrows when ranging.
  2. how do I add protect item? ( looking for a way of how to check the price of equipped items and etc)
  3. real skulls. Setting up 20 minutes timer for not getting skulled and etc…
  4. Adding non-multi for melee, magic and etc.
  5. item operate handler ( in inv)
  6. magicOnNPC handler
  7. looking for effecient way of adding mixing potions ( cba adding in itemOnItem 1 by 1… will need 150 statements to do it this way)
  8. requesting mapdata for western areas of wilderness ( badly need it for agility area)
  9. need help with npcRequestTo

n.requestFaceTo(p.playerId + 32768); brings me Error: Class72:59 PacketParser:1266 Class14:33 Class90:143 client:784 Applet_Sub
1:485 Applet_Sub1:156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.RuntimeException: gnp1 po
s:42 psize:6 | T2 - 222,216,217 - 6,2489,5173 - 11,2,0,16,-128,1,

  1. SOLVED

  2. going above 99hp makes the hp bar almost fully red, some green… if go back to below 99 hp bar works fine. Need help with setting hp bar to be full green if going above 99hp.

Thank you for reading.

p.s. leave msn if you’re willing to help or just leave the post.
